description: Lift availability on the Rail and Underground network in London

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["This page includes information on lift availability on the Rail and Underground network."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Lift availability is based on the total hours lifts were working as a percentage of total scheduled service hours. Unavailable time includes:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Planned works","Time out of service due to faults"]}
Lift availability information for quarter 3 2018/19 (from 16 September 2018 to 5 January 2019) can be found below.
